comment.text: 3.5.0 has significant issues and will not be released to stable.

long_desc.thetext:
Latest upstream release: 3.5.0-rc.1
Current version/release in rawhide: 3.4.2-1.1.fc32
URL: https://github.com/sylabs/singularity/

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy


More information about the service that created this bug can be found at: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring


Please keep in mind that with any upstream change, there may also be packaging changes that need to be made. Specifically, please remember that it is your responsibility to review the new version to ensure that the licensing is still correct and that no non-free or legally problematic items have been added upstream.

Latest upstream release: 3.5.0
Current version/release in rawhide: 3.5.0~rc.2-1.fc32
URL: https://github.com/sylabs/singularity/

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy


More information about the service that created this bug can be found at: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring


Please keep in mind that with any upstream change, there may also be packaging changes that need to be made. Specifically, please remember that it is your responsibility to review the new version to ensure that the licensing is still correct and that no non-free or legally problematic items have been added upstream.


Based on the information from anitya: https://release-monitoring.org/project/10920/
FEDORA-EPEL-2019-d70eb8987e has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 8. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2019-d70eb8987e

3.5.0 is already in testing for these releases (I forgot to link this bug to them):
el6: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2019-9301358df3
el7: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2019-f6587c90ec
fc31: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2019-a1e4cdb6f6
And in rawhide
rawhide: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2019-267aeec82e

It did not build in fc29 and fc30 because of a lack of golang-1.13.  el8 had the same problem, but I applied a patch to revert that to golang-1.11 in a singularity-3.5.0-1.1.  A side effect of that is that the plugin system will be broken.  I don't think it's worth doing the same for the older Fedora releases.

Having done all that, there have been significant other bugs found in the upstream 3.5.0, so I do not plan to promote 3.5.0 to stable.  A 3.5.1 is expected soon.

comment.text: No issues noted in testing. LGTM.
Basic functionality tested and working. Verified the security fix is present and works.
